subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: After its sparkling victory against Panama, the United States is surely in an enviable position as it heads into the second half of the so-called Hexagonal tournament.
snippet: After its sparkling victory against Panama, the United States is surely in an enviable position as it heads into the second half of the so-called Hexagonal tournament.
